data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=d94jXOIEQwIQ7kNvgHTp_dV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAG16HLUlhwH3CNr1dfVd6DKfHqiZfM9nyywdpYEXrjCA&oe=66A03D5C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JZU3liSauDYQ7kNvgEWSvtO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC1q0s3g_kbZJUsR2YL6px9lYsjCD8fTLPq8zzd--1P-A&oe=66A046E4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pI_xX6U7nwEQ7kNvgGjry6z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDTYm51izn4W4ySYtYFRl7QBrrIXypC9eiupbcLeqm60A&oe=66A02E47)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=n0uouOdJtSYQ7kNvgGNwT6m&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDiFTasTDI5AQqAOEKdg7mEBUIVDgHOcpe5D3qiUHEGDQ&oe=66A05966)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=auj1pV7wcl0Q7kNvgHuSdqz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBAfKXhpsZ1FlyIfaoKq4VuZOnTCTZ9_FoFGrQKyBJOYA&oe=66A04D98)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WHTzBNyJA2sQ7kNvgHHKxg9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBxEwajoHygaGzKRPNDeI8E6WO9r7kCpb3kUL6YvlWpAQ&oe=66A04A19)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XzfUTdQGkBkQ7kNvgEgrIzX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBcJU-PjbLblHO3RrWD4J99NARzT9n8AVdNvPs_8qp4vw&oe=66A03030)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vI53eNXtMcAQ7kNvgECwu55&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBcB_EQc2urQZG6DCItN0gEue_bwSXygAyVWQRZQari5w&oe=66A052EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=mXEqUOeoLygQ7kNvgHHpw53&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBV2p2cLF7VcqdxMU3h0ZGsT9uIM6hZ2Gsl4sD7DYX6lw&oe=66A02E57)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=v1ZP5bxzgZUQ7kNvgEEPLOc&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAIaBm-fcyH_OMjXR7y6y41z4lt_M30XNDizT1rCu0weg&oe=66A049CC)
